logo.serverSubtitle: Discover a vibrant world full of possibilities and design your character according to your ideas.

features.headerSubtitle: Discover countless and exciting possibilities - from realistic jobs to dynamic interactions. interactions. Immerse yourself in an immersive role-playing world.
features.feature1Text: Whether civilian, police officer or doctor - everyone has the chance to become the best in their field. Assert yourself against the competition on the job or against your rivals on the street. Shape your life with the your life with the systems on offer.
features.feature2Text: There are no limits to your creativity. Become self-employed and build your own business up.
features.feature3Text: Thanks to our completely independently developed systems and cloud clusters, we offer a gaming experience without lags!
features.feature4Text: Can't fit a leaf between you and your friends? Form a gang or a community.
features.feature5Text: Looking for a quick buck? Whether it's a spontaneous shoplifting or a long-planned coup, you decide.

whitelist.headerSubtitle: We are not fans of excessive requirements, but we do demand a certain standard. Our whitelist system is fully automatic - start at any time!
whitelist.step1Text: Register with your Discord account in our User Control Panel.
whitelist.step2Text: Complete our questionnaire-based whitelist. After passing you will be activated for the server automatically.
whitelist.step3Text: Nothing stands in your way! Start the game and enter our world.

faq.headerSubtitle: Do you have a few questions in advance? You may already find an answer in our most frequently asked questions. an answer.
faq.question1: What platform is your server based on?
faq.answer1: After some back and forth, we have decided to use the GTA V modification FiveM. Therefore, you need the corresponding launcher to play with us.
faq.question2: The server is not open yet? When will you start?
faq.answer2: We do our best for you every day, but the project is purely a hobby and we don't want to put any pressure on ourselves. We cannot and will not give an exact release date.
faq.question3: What is the minimum age on your server?
faq.answer3: Our server requires an age of 18 years. There is no exception to this rule - not even with the permission of a parent or guardian!
